HEADER.Title: Run command given command via ssh for windows

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RunCommandAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_CMD@WIN
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -command &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# ! Invoking java binar &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
